          <title>
            <string language="sl">Simetrija dipola</string>
            <string language="en">Dipole Symmetry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dipol-Symmetrie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Symétrie de Dipöle</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Obnašanje naboja v polju dipola (dveh nabojev).</string>
            <string language="en">The behavior of a charged particle in a electric field caused by dipole.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le comportement d'une particule chargée dans un

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O comportamento de uma partícula carregada em um

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il comportamento di una particella caricata in un

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η συμπεριφορά ενός χρεωμένου μορίου σε ένα ηλεκτρικό
πεδίο που προκαλείται από το δίπολο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El comportamiento de una partícula cargada en un
campo eléctrico causado por el dipolo.</string>
          </description>
